about_the_game:
This DLC will continue the adventure of Cindy and Michelle. The content has full audio and offers the option to have the story narrated by either Cindy or Michelle. Dialogs are included in the narration and adapt accordingly.
Sounds and effects have been added and audio was edited to include sensual characters voice effect.
Renders are in 4k and there are approx. 160 images.
Also, achievements have been created.

A planned updated to sounds will be available for EP01 and EP02, blond guy, more sensual audio effects for Michelle and Cindy.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Sexual violence is included, in a very mild form (fist fight, knife or gun combat) or only partly in consensual sex scenes as part of the act but absolutely willingly. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.

detailed_description:
This DLC will continue the adventure of Cindy and Michelle. The content has full audio and offers the option to have the story narrated by either Cindy or Michelle. Dialogs are included in the narration and adapt accordingly.
Sounds and effects have been added and audio was edited to include sensual characters voice effect.
Renders are in 4k and there are approx. 160 images.
Also, achievements have been created.

A planned updated to sounds will be available for EP01 and EP02, blond guy, more sensual audio effects for Michelle and Cindy.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Midnight Stories 2 - DLC 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft XP
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
